group_1.narration: I could never wait for school@to be over back in those days.
The very moment class was dismissed,@I raced out of the classroom and through@the city under the light of the setting sun.@Everything in my vision gleamed and@shone brightly all the while.

When I caught my reflection in the glass@of a nearby shop, I fixed my bangs a little.@But it still wasn't quite right, so I fixed@it again one more time. And then I went@back to running towards our usual cafe.
I was out of breath, my heart thundering@against my chest, and I couldn't think of@anything but the person waiting for me…@And that was enough.@This sunset was made just for us.
…And there I was.

While I tried to catch my breath,@I pulled out my mom's compact mirror,@which I was using without permission, and@checked myself again in the reflection… Argh.@I was indeed still worrying over my bangs.

I don't know what it is, but…@People say that compacts have magic in them@that let you make yourself into the person@you want to be, but the more I gazed into that@mirror, the further away I felt from that goal.
But…I don't have time to mess around with@my hair forever. I'm sure she's already in@her seat waiting for me, as she always is…
Hanna was waiting for me in the seat@we usually reserved by the window.
She's always there first somehow…@I'm supposed to be closer to the cafe than@she is, but she always arrived first, and@waited for me there without ordering.
It looks like she's reading a book…@I wonder what it is?@I was so caught up in her gentle gaze that I@forgot to call out to her, and just kept staring.
Suddenly…Hanna looked right at me@with a little smile tugging on her face.@She wasn't surprised at all, as if she'd@known I was there all along…
Her lips moved to say, "Found you."
Whenever and wherever I was…@Hanna always found me, didn't she?
When I became a Witch and used my transplant@magic to transfer my persona into Hanna,@who was there with me, she still noticed@my presence even then.
I was so exhausted that I couldn't speak,@like a ghost on the verge of disappearing…@but she found me in the darkness and@saved me by sharing her magic.

group_1.textRight: You're a lifesaver, Sena.

group_1.textLeft: I was? But I thought you were the one who@gave me your magic and saved me…

group_1.textRight: Actually… I was about to kill myself.
I know the deal with Soul Gems,
so I was gonna try breaking mine with magic,@hoping I'd die a wild and glorious death.

But something went wrong… [chara:301801:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:301801:lipSynch_1][chara:301801:cheek_0][chara:301801:face_mtn_ex_000.exp3.json]Or I guess,@went right in this case? Well, whatever.
So because of that, my magic power wound up@going to you…and brought you back to me.
And if you're here, I got no reason in trying@to die anymore.
So that makes you my lifesaver!
I'm really glad I didn't die!
…Please don't leave me alone ever again.

group_1.narration: [textBlack:I wasn't the one who left you, Hanna.]
…I didn't want you to die and leave hope@for the world. I wanted you to stay…
Oh, Hanna…@All I wanted was for you to stay.
Because without you, it doesn't matter if the@Mirror Witch swallowed up the whole world.@It doesn't matter one bit how well the@Automatic Purification System works…
I have no reason to live.
Now that it's all over…even though Magical Girls@have been given hope for the future…@No, that's exactly why my problems@as a Witch are coming into focus and@making me feel this way so strongly…
Hanna…
I miss you, Hanna…
There's nothing here…
…Those days I spent with you were the only@things that made me myself… Those days…@They were the saturation point of my happiness.@My hope.
How long must I stay here?@In a world without Hanna.@In a world without hope…@All alone…
I want to see Hanna.@I want to touch her right now.@I want her to take my hand and bring me to a@beautiful world where there's no one but us…

group_1.textCenter: Hey, Hanna…@I can't take this anymore.
Haven't I done well?@Haven't I done enough?

group_1.narration: "This…this has to be enough, right?"
After making my decision, the days flew by.@The season turned to winter and it's not@even Christmas, but the snow is already here.

group_1.textCenter: …Say, Iroha.@What are you guys doing for Christmas?
Thank goodness… You hadn't been speaking to@me at all, so I was getting worried…

group_1.textRight: What's wrong?

group_1.textLeft: Oh, it's nothing big.@Mikoto hadn't talked to me in a while.

group_1.textRight: I still can't get used to Mikoto being a part@of you, Sis…

group_1.narration: I told her I wanted to have a Christmas party@and host a big celebration with lots of guests…
We'll decorate a magnificent tree, prepare lots@of food, exchange gifts with each other…@And make it a fun Christmas.

group_1.textCenter: I've been alone for so long that I have no good@memories of the holiday.
So I'm hoping we can have a good Christmas@this year…

group_1.narration: …Those really were my honest thoughts.

group_1.textCenter: Anyway…could you pass that along to Yachiyo@and the others…?
…So that's what came up so suddenly.

group_1.textLeft: …Right. So let's have a nice Christmas this year.

group_1.textRight: We need to let everyone know!

group_1.textCenter: …It's going to be a lot of work to put together.
Tell her we're going to need to buy tree@decorations at a specialty store anyway.
We'll find them if we travel far enough.

group_1.narration: I told them since this would be my first time@celebrating, I wanted to have a real Christmas@party, and they all went along with it.
Of course, I told them that we should go@shopping on the next day we were all free.@We'd have lots of bags to carry, after all!@And they agreed with me.

group_1.textRight: Why did I have to come to Magia Record@by myself…?

group_1.textLeft: You're not happy about the sudden change@of plans?

group_1.textRight: It's not that… I just wish it didn't have to be@on the day of our shopping trip.
Oh, are you here alone, Nemu?

group_1.textLeft: Yes… Did I not inform you?
Touka is at Mifuyu's today and won't be home.

group_1.narration: Yes…she did inform us, and I remembered.@That's why I chose today to be the day of the@shopping trip and sent the others away.

group_1.textLeft: In any case…weren't you supposed to go@shopping for ornaments today?

group_1.textRight: That's right… But Mikoto said there was@something she needed to do here.
Eh…?

group_1.narration: It's true, I do want to have a good Christmas, but...@I don't want to make those memories with you guys.
The only memories I'll ever want@are the ones I share with Hanna…
"That's why…I decided to take it back."

group_1.textRight: Nemu!
A-are you okay…? You're not hurt, are you?@You collapsed so suddenly it gave me a shock…
*Gasp*
Th-that way you're speaking…@It can't be… Mikoto…?

group_1.textLeft: Got it in one! With my transplant magic,@I was able to take over her body.

group_1.textRight: You can… You can still use that…?

group_1.textLeft: So long as my persona remains, my magic@won't ever disappear.

group_1.narration: "Well, I knew it would cause some@problems if you figured that out, so@I kept building up my magic in secret.@Still, this was honestly pretty hard…@It would've been a total disaster if this hadn't@been enough to hijack Nemu. *Giggle*"

group_1.textLeft: …Only Nemu is able to carry this out…

group_1.textRight: Eh…?

group_1.textLeft: Well then, I'll be taking it back now.
